name: Ninja
overview:
Speed, Endurance, and Determination are just a few of the skills needed in order to become a warrior of the shadows.

Ever wondered what it takes to become a Ninja? Well, now is the chance. Sprint, Dodge, Climb, throw Shurikens, and exhibit Reflexes that rival the wind. Every ounce of spirit will need to be utilized in order to successfully complete each intense skill test. Brave the turbulent trials alone, or find another player who wishes to the walk the path. This is a true test for those who believe they have what it takes. Upon completing the trials, the player with the most skill points will be rewarded with the honorary title of "Ninja".
